::Lord Jhiaxus::
   
  Jhiaxus draws some energon shackles from subspace and binds Hot Rod's hands behind his back. He also gags him for when the the effects of Hydras' shot wear off. Finally Jhiaxus attaches a signal masker to Hot Rod's back, under the right side of his fender.
   
  Jhiaxus: Centuries of being a damn hero are about to catch up with you, Auto-fool!

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras:

"And the torture? You enjoyed a lot the idea to have a play time aka 
torture his wife, will you let pass the chance to... Have a play time 
with him? Hold him and mask his signature... he will enjoy watching 
this, after all this will be quick compared what he's going to suffer"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Hot Rod/Jhiaxus/Zarak::
> 
> Hot Rod was paying attention to see if "Nightlight" was hurt 
which allowed Hydras to fire his weapon without Hot Rod being 
prepared. The shot strikes Hot Rod directly on the Autobot symbol on 
his chest. His motor function fail and he falls to the ground. He 
tries to scream out for Nightlight but cannot move his vocal 
projectors.
> 
> Jhiaxus is now up and returns from the swamp. He is slightly 
charred.
> 
> Jhiaxus: I kinda wish we had planned to just kill him now.
> 
> Zarak has come too but is in pain.
> 
> Zarak: He broke my exo-suit...
> 
> Getting up.
> 
> Zarak: Ouch! I think he broke a rib too.
> 
> xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> Hydras hissed with PAin but still hold the clone, when Hot rod 
spoke at 
> him, Hydras shot a special gun that would paralize him, he would be 
> fully conceus, but he couldnt move in a lage while.
> 
> OOC: If you let that robo
> 
> 
> 
>
